purging count tags Purge Posted Count Tags
section.para: Purging count tags deletes the count tags from your system, freeing up disk storage space. To purge count tags from the system once they have been posted, go to Inventory > Physical Inventory > Purge Posted Count Tags. The following screen will appear:
When purging posted count tags, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: All posted count tags up to and including this date will be purged.
Select to purge posted count tags for all sites.
Specify site where posted count tags are to be purged.

listitem.para: Purges posted count tags from the system.
